content.prompt: With his installation A Book from the Sky, Xu Bing intended to elicit a response by confronting viewers with

choices.label: traditional watercolor paintings that show only abstract images
characters that resemble real text but have no actual meaning
hand-drawn calligraphy that conveys only repetitions of propagandistic messages
images appropriated from western media but printed in traditional Chinese woodcut

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
